feed.title: Attas Blog
feed.subtitle: Welcome to Abdullah Alattas's blog, where you'll follow my journey as a full-stack developer with a focus on Ruby on Rails. Join me as I share my progress, insights and tips on web development using Ruby on Rails.

entry.title: Announcement!
entry.summary:
Hello, my name is Abdullah and I’m thrilled to announce the launch of my new blog, where I’ll be documenting my journey as a full-stack developer with a focus on Ruby on Rails.
For the past year, I’ve been immersing myself in the world of web development and learning as much as I can about the different technologies and techniques involved. It’s been a challenging and rewarding experience, and...
